Do Not Harden Your Hearts (Psalms 95:1–11)

\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w Today|strong="G4594"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G1437"\w* \w hear|strong="G5456"\w* \w His|strong="G3588"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*,

See \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w*, brothers, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w none|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* unbelief \w that|strong="G3588"\w* turns away \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
